new_skill_specs.name: analyze_graph_continuity
new_skill_specs.purpose: Analyze the graph of a function to determine continuity at specified points.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A dictionary with point labels as keys and boolean values indicating continuity.
edge_cases: Graph with very close points that might be hard to distinguish
Graph with multiple discontinuities close to each other

new_skill_specs.name: determine_overall_continuity
new_skill_specs.purpose: Determine the overall continuity of the function based on point-wise continuity results.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A string 'Yes' or 'No' indicating overall continuity.
edge_cases: All points are continuous except one
